text: As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-bāqiru li-ʿilmi Allāh.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-fāḥiṣu ʿan dīni Allāh.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-mubayyinu li-ḥukmi Allāh.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-qāʾimu bi-qisṭi Allāh.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-nāṣiḥu li-ʿibādi Allāh.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-dāʿī ilā Allāh.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-dalīlu ilā Allāh.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-munazzahu ʿani al-muʿḍilāt.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-maʿṣūmu mina al-zallāt.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-zakiyyū fī al-ḥasab.
As-salāmu ʿalayka ayyuhā al-rafīʿu fī al-nasab.
As-salāmu ʿalayka yā ḥujjata Allāhi ʿalā al-khalqi ajmaʿīn.
Ash-hadu yā mawlāya annaka qad ṣadaʿta al-ḥaqqa ṣadʿan.
Lam taʾkhudhka fī Allāhi lawnatu lāʾim.
Wa akhrajta awliyāʾaka min wilāyati ghayri Allāh ilā wilāyati Allāh.
Wa dhahaba bika ilā dāri karāmatih.
Wa al-salāmu ʿalayka wa raḥmatullāhi wa barakātuh.
title: Imam Mohammed Baqer (as)
